name: Forevermore
description:
Forevermore,  Maxim. A supernatural town on a magic forbidden planet. Home to many mysterious characters and even bigger mysteries. Join a lively band of teenagers (and their teachers) as they try to stop a series of deaths and the secret behind them. Will you be able to reveal Forevermore's secret and save your friends? Or will you be too late?

Begin to undercover one of the mysteries of Forevermore, all you have to do is play the game.

Features

  • Choice based system.
  • Fantasy-like soundtrack
  • Interesting characters
  • Next chapter coming soon!

(This game is a collaborative effort between @Helvest and I, and is very much in progress. That means that currently, it might have a couple of bugs here and there and anything in the game is subject to change . Since this is so, any feedback about bugs or anything odd in general would be appreciated. We do hope to create an enjoyable experience for players and feedback would help greatly in doing that)
